amendment.description: Amendment designates a National Day of Honor for members of the Armed Forces who have served in Iraq, Afghanistan, and other combat areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 111 printed in House Report 112-88 to designate a National Day of Honor for members of the Armed Forces who have served in Iraq, Afghanistan, and other combat areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 0 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
